items.title: ‘AI Detective’ Flags Brain Lesions in Children With Epilepsy

items.title: Are There Fewer SMuRF-less CVD Patients Than We Thought?
items.description: Almost all patients have at least one nonoptimal traditional risk factor before first cardiac event. Medscape Medical News

items.title: New Type of Glucose Sensor to Enter US Market
items.description: The Biolinq Shine wearable displays color-coded glucose values and adds other metrics via an app. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Antiplatelet Plus OAC Lowers Stroke, Raises Bleeding Risk

items.title: Measles Cases Surge in Australia
items.description: Experts say Australia’s falling vaccination rate has created a perfect storm for the spread of the disease. Medscape Medical News
